item.description:
Another bargain brunch with a little background music at the legendary Johnny D's in Davis Square Somerville.

"Here's a place that has it all: good food, cheap drinks, friendly surroundings, and a knack for booking the near great and the soon-to-be-great."
"The Best of Boston" - Boston Magazine

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks tip and tax.

Reservations are not accepted, PLEASE BE PROMPT, so you can be seated with us.

Brunch Menu:
http://www.johnnyds.c...

Driving Directions:
http://www.johnnyds.c...

Metered Parking Lots:
http://www.ci.somervi...
Buena Vista Lot - Holland Street
Herbert Street Lot
Grove Street Lots
Brooks Pharmacy Lot - Highland and Grove Street
Cutter Street Lot


MBTA:
Steps from Davis Square MBTA station on the Red Line.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Johnny D's Jazz Brunch Sunday June 10th at Noon
